name: ConferenceInstanceId
description: PRIMARY KEY: Unique Identifier for a Conference Instance

name: DisplayName
description: The Displayed name of the Conference

name: OfficialUrl
description: The URL of the Offical Conference Website

name: StartDate
description: The start date of the Conference Instance

name: EndDate
description: The end date of the Conference Instance

name: AbstractRegistrationDate
description: The Abstract registration date for this Conference Instance

name: SubmissionDeadlineDate
description: The submission deadline for this Conference Instance

name: NotificationDueDate
description: The notification date for this Conference Instance

name: FinalVersionDueDate
description: The final version due date for this Conference Instance

name: PaperCount
description: The number of Papers that have been identified from this Conference Instance

name: PaperFamilyCount
description: Same as PaperCount with the following provisions - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/academic-services/graph/resources-faq#papercount-vs-paperfamilycount

name: CitationCount
description: The sum of citations for Papers that have been linked to this Conference Instance

name: Latitude
description: The Latitude of the Conference Instance

name: Longitude
description: The Longitude of the Conference Instance

name: CreatedDate
description: The date in which this record was first created
